articles.title: Massive solar storm strikes Earth; South America suffers BLACKOUT, says NASA - HT Tech
articles.description: The Earth has just suffered a direct hit by a solar storm. The resulting radiation has caused a shortwave radio blackout over South America.
articles.content: Since the beginning of 2023, the Earth has become a target of vicious solar activity. After suffering a solar storm right on the new year's day, the Earth also became a victim of another eruption in … [+2332 chars]

articles.title: Vitamin D Status a Common Health Concern for People with Lupus, Though Not Linked to Disease Activity - Lupus Foundation of America
articles.description: Research shows that while taking vitamin D supplements can be a great way to increase blood levels of vitamin D, it may not improve lupus disease activity.
articles.content: Nicknamed the sunshine vitamin, vitamin D can be made by the body when skin is exposed to ultraviolet (UV) radiation from the sun. However, many people with lupus need to avoid the sun due to photose… [+1583 chars]
